document.full_text: the world's banks face a $3.6 trillion "wall of maturing debt" in the next two years and must compete with debt-laden governments to secure financing, the imf warned on wednesday.
document.title: banks face $3.6 trillion "wall" of maturing debt: imf
lines_and_colors: the world's banks face a $3.6 trillion "wall of maturing debt" in the next two years and must compete with debt-laden governments to secure financing, the imf warned on wednesday.
